editorialNotes.standard: Miniclipâ€™s 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.Â
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!

editorialNotes.tagline: Put the pedal to the metal
editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as everâ€”and you wonâ€™t believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.
editorialNotes.short: Hit top speed and don't look back.

editorialNotes.standard: Always wanted to be a football star? Score! Hero puts you in the kit of a young upstart, making your way to bigger and better clubs. The controls couldnâ€™t be simplerâ€”simply draw a line where you want the ball to go, and let the action unfold. While the gameplay is easy to learn, Score! Hero also shines with depth, rewarding thoughtful passes and smart shots over wild swiping.
